summary: Wendy S. Collins was an employee of the Select Committee on Assassinations (SCAS). She is listed in payroll and certification reports from April, August and December of 1978. The documents provide her name, and in some cases, her salary and gross pay during those periods. The documents do not specify her role within the committee.
significance: Wendy S. Collins' significance lies in her employment with the Select Committee on Assassinations, indicating her involvement in the investigation, although her specific role is not detailed in the provided documents.
